Job Description - Applications Architect 3

Please share me the candidates profile and just to let you know that I would be needing only GC, USC or H1B candidate for this role. It is a 100% Remote role. Kindly get the skill matrix form filled out by the candidate with the 3 professional references on it.

Duration - Multi Year (Contract)
Location - 100% Remote Role
Interview - Video call / w/ our client manager (mine conversation is brief, we will need to speak to you just prior to submission)

MUST HAVE
8 Required Experience programming with Java/J2EE and web programming concepts
8 Required Experience in software development
8 Required Knowledge of Linux operating Systems, Apache Tomcat, webservices, DB2 database, writing and executing complex SQL queries
8 Required Exercises logic and reasoning to define problems, establish facts, and draw valid conclusions.
8 Required Effective oral and written communication
8 Required Working in a team environment and ability to communicate and assist with training other team members.
6 Required Experience guiding and recommending Application Architecture and Standardization
4 Required Experience with JIRA and JAMA
4 Required Working with Azure DevOps

PREFERRED
8 Preferred Experience performing code reviews.
5 Preferred Experience with DB2 and SQL

Minimum Requirements: Candidates that do not meet or exceed the minimum stated requirements (skills/experience) will be displayed to customers but may not be chosen for this opportunity.
